title: flashr
text: flashr number built-flashcard decks help learn R, especially tidyverse. workhorse package flashcard() function, uses reveal.js3 generate HTML presentation displaying terms descriptions. RStudio users, flashcard presentation appear Viewer pane. Outside RStudio, function open presentation default browser. either case, can advance slides right arrow key clicking right arrow presentation. example, create set flashcards built-data_types deck, simply run: presentation start title deck, give blank slide, present first term, followed description, blank slide. order terms/descriptions randomized flashcard() function run, just re-run generate different order.
code: flashcard("data_types")

title: flashr
text: default, terms presented descriptions. see term, try define/describe term. possible present descriptions first can guess term including termfirst = FALSE argument.
code: flashcard("data_types", termsfirst = FALSE)

title: flashr
text: Another feature flashcard() can present name package function. Often useful distinguish base R function functions require packages. default, presentations include package names. However, can turn package = FALSE.
code: flashcard("data_types", package = FALSE)

title: flashr
text: flashr uses reveal.js create presentations, can use available reveal.js themes. default, flashcard() uses moon theme, doesn’t suit , can change theme setting theme argument. moment, available themes black, white, league, beige, sky, night, serif, simple, solarized, blood, moon.
code: flashcard("data_types", theme = "sky")

title: Create deck from vector of functions — create_deck
text: x Name pre-existing flashcard deck path name CSV file containing terms descriptions title Title provided flashcard deck. Defaults "Custom deck" provided. termsfirst Logical indicating whether show terms first (TRUE) descriptions first (FALSE) package Logical indicating whether include package name term theme Name reveal.js theme use flashcards file Path file name used save flashcard deck locally (must save HTML) fontsize Base font size presentation. Acceptable values include "default" (500%), "large" (700%), "small" (300%). Custom values can set percentages (e.g., "250%"). fontcolor Font color non-link text.  Can R color name, HTML color name, hex code. linkcolor Font color link text.  Can R color name, HTML color name, hex code. use_browser Logical indicating whether show presentation RStudio viewer available (FALSE) system's default browser (TRUE)

title: Create deck from vector of functions — create_deck
text: HTML file terms descriptions rendered RStudio viewer web browser.

title: Create deck from vector of functions — create_deck
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # \donttest{ # Display terms then descriptions my_functions <- c("as_tibble()", "bind_rows()", "c()") create_deck(x = my_functions)  # Customize the title create_deck(x = my_functions, title = "My deck")  # Save the HTML version of the flashcard deck locally create_deck(x = my_functions, title = "My deck", file = "my_deck.html") # } }
